description: Tree work in conservation area.Pruning of 6 trees. Works:-  (Trees list S-N-E of street from corner of No. 34 St.  Mary's Grove)  a)Lime (Corner of boundary with 34 St. Mary's Grove) Reduce height by up to 12' to correct lean of leader. Clean up trunk and balance crown.  b)Lime - Reduce height by one third.Cut back branch  overhanging pavement by half. Thin and balance crown.  c)Lime - Crown reduce by one third.Cut back branch over pavement by up to 8'.Crown lift by up to 20' over pavement and towards the house.Balance crown.  d)Lime - Take out branch over pavement flush to fork leaving only the main trunk.Reduce height by one third and balance crown. For continuation of proposal see below under informative
decision_conditions: To protect the health and stability of trees to be retained on the site, and to ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
